result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ryan M. Anderson

defendant.name: Anderson, Ryan M.
defendant.address: 618 S Barstow St, Eau Claire, WI 54701

records.addlTxt: Notice of Hearing - Return to Sender, Vacant, Unable to Forward
Plea hearing on November 10, 2022 at 11:00 am.

11:28am Cases called: 22CF60 & 22CF464. Defendant Ryan M. Anderson in court.  Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard appeared by video for Ryan M. Anderson.  Attorney Matthew Z Kirkpatrick in court for State of Wisconsin. This is the date and time set for an arraignment on these cases. 

Defendant waives reading of Information and enters Not Guilty pleas. Court accepts pleas Parties are close to an agreement. The agreement contemplates a DAGP. Defense requests a status conference/possible plea
Plea Hearing: 11/10/22 at 11am

10:00 am cases 22CF60 and 22CF464 called. Defendant Ryan M. Anderson in court.  Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard appeared by video for Ryan M. Anderson.  Prosecuting attorney Robert W. Stoiber in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Warrants are quashed in both files. Defense enters not guilty pleas which are accepted by the Court. 
Cases referred to Branch 5 to schedule ARGN.
Return on warrant on August 25, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Notice of Hearing - Return to Sender, Not Deliverable as Addressed, Unable to Forward

9:34 AM cases 22CF60, 22CF464 called.  Prosecuting Attorney Matthew Z Kirkpatrick in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard appeared by video via Zoom for Ryan M. Anderson. Defendant Ryan M. Anderson not in court. Attorney Rivard states he was unable to make contact with Defendant. State requests warrants.

Warrants ordered.

(Cases called at 10:18 AM - 22CF60 and 22CF464)
Defendant Ryan M. Anderson appears in custody via videoconference from the Chippewa County Jail.  Attorney Francis Rivard appears in the courtroom.  Attorney Kelly Ronquist appears for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is scheduled to be released on July 28, 2022.  Offer is for a Deferred Acceptance of Guilty Plea agreement.  Defendant advised of his right to a preliminary hearing in 22CF464.  Defendant waives right to preliminary hearing - waiver accepted by Court.  
Status Conference/Arraignment: August 19, 2022 at 9:30 AM (In person)
Notice of Hearing, Notice of Assignment of Judge - Return to Sender, Not Deliverable as Addressed, Unable to Forward

(Cases 22CF60, 22CF464 are called at 9:52 AM - by Zoom) Prosecuting attorney Kelly Ronquist in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ryan M. Anderson in court.  Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard appeared by video for Ryan M. Anderson. 
22CF60- Defense acknowledges receipt of Information, waives reading, enters Not Guilty pleas to all counts. 
Status Conference in 22CF60 and Hearing in 22CF464 to be scheduled with Branch 5 Judicial Assistant.

Conditions: 
Comply with Pre-Trial Monitoring Services to include possible CTC testing.

(Case called at 11:13 AM- by Zoom) Defendant Ryan Anderson appears in custody via video conference from the Jail with Attorney Karl Schmidt. ADA Andrew Gunderson appears in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defense waives reading of the complaint. Defendant updates address. Defendant is eligible for Public Defender representation. Time limits for preliminary hearing are waived. 
Hearing: 04/25/2022 at 9:30 AM.

ADDRESS INFO for Ryan M. Anderson
Current: 618 S Barstow St, Eau Claire, WI 54701 United States  (Effective: 04-21-2022)
Prior: Homeless, Eau Claire, WI 54703

Conditions:
Comply with Pre-Trial Monitoring Services to include possible CTC testing.
